content.question: If the government regulates a natural monopolist to produce the allocatively efficient level of output, it will require the monopolist to set a price that is

choices.label: equal to its marginal cost and grant a subsidy to cover the loss
equal to its average total cost and levy a tax on the excess profit
greater than its marginal cost and levy a tax on the excess profit
greater than its marginal cost but that minimizes the deadweight loss
greater than its average total cost but that minimizes the deadweight loss

content.answer: equal to its marginal cost and grant a subsidy to cover the loss
